description.text: I'm sorry for the vague description... But the issue is I don't know where the structure is or what it looks like. It's a villager castle with create contraption, I believe you'll know it when you see it.
That is fascinating! However, I do not think these villagers built it themselves, they don't have an engineer with them... Someone is keeping them there. Either way, thanks a lot. Here's a cookie.
